coord_elem_t Struct Reference

#include <coord_elem.h>


Data Fields

int r
int c
double val

Detailed Description

A single element of a ``coordinate array'' sparse matrix. It is similar to COO format, except that it uses the ``array of structs'' (as opposed to ``struct of arrays'') storage paradigm. An array of coord_elem_t represents a sparse matrix, each of whose entries is represented by a single coord_elem_t.

Field Documentation

int coord_elem_t::c

Column index of the element

int coord_elem_t::r

Row index of the element

double coord_elem_t::val

Value of the element
